channel.title: My New Website, Built From Scratch
channel.description:
Well, I'm now working on a brand new l33t website for my next upcoming game. You can track my progress here:
http://revolutionxgame.com/newsite/index.html
For now, I really don't have anything thats complete uploaded right now, that's why you don't see anything, but I'm working on that right now, so mods, don't lock please.

item.title: My New Website, Built From Scratch
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:37, topic:144079”][quote author=Sick of Air link=topic=197567.msg1779116#msg1779116 date=1190701551]
When do you believe this might be finished?
[/quote]

When I get around to it… I have an extremely busy schedule.

Wake up at 6:30 A.M.
School at 8:20 A.M.
Work at 4:00 P.M
Get home at 10:00 P.M.

By then I’m beat so I mostly go to sleep.[/quote] strict schedule ö

Read full topic

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ah, RXVL, you haven’t made it where it looks the same on all resolutions :eek: VB7 is seeing problems on his 1024x768 resolutions that I’m not seeing on my 1280x1024 resolution… I did see a few problems though

item.title: My New Website, Built From Scratch
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

I’d just like to point a few things out with the layout.

First, the nav boxes on the left, the last item sort of overlaps the bottom border and makes it look really icky.

Second, the text on the news pane would look better if it were more ‘contained’ within it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

XxKanexX:

I don’t mind the background, why does everyone hate it?

I personally like it. It’s better than what I can do… I’m currently trying to make a website myself, but at the moment, I’m just getting the layout ready. I haven’t done anything with images xD

EDIT: I just noticed your newstablet.gif was kind of dirty in the corners, so I decided to fix it for you, in case you haven’t already
